triumph.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to gain a victory or success after a difficult struggle
triumph.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: In the end, good shall triumph over evil.
triumph.translation[1].definitions[0].de: an important victory or success after a difficult struggle
triumph.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Winning the championship is a great personal triumph.
a tremendous diplomatic triumph for France
triumph.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a feeling of pleasure and satisfaction that you get from victory or success
triumph.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: He rode in triumph to the Tsar.
triumph.translation[1].definitions[2].de: a very successful example of something
triumph.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: The gallery is a triumph of design.
triumph.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a type of motorcycle made by the British company Triumph, which is known for being well-made in a traditional way. The Triumph company also used to make sports cars.
